compute-management
******************


Description
===========

Compute Management Service CLI


Available Commands
==================

* instance-configuration

  * create

  * delete

  * get

  * launch-compute-instance

  * list

  * update

* instance-pool

  * attach-lb

  * create

  * detach-lb

  * get

  * list

  * list-instances

  * reset

  * softreset

  * start

  * stop

  * terminate

  * update
